casebody.data:
SCOTT TIMBER COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 2006-5101. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. May 10, 2007. Rehearing Denied July 6, 2007.

*973Before RADER, GAJARSA and DYK, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
